	{{InventorySubtractWipSku.selectedOptionValue}},
	-{{WipSubtractQtyToPick.text}}, 
	{{WipSubtractNewWipOnHand.text}}, 
	{{appsmith.store.EmpID}},GETDATE() ,
	{{WipAddAdjType.selectedOptionValue}}
	)
